name: Sky Battles (itch) (Rubtid Game Studio)
description:
Sky battles is a two-player shooter that can be played either with a bot or with friends.

Firstly, in Sky battles there are many different maps, which are constantly updated, so the gameplay will always be varied and you will not get bored!

Secondly, in Sky battles there are many skins or hats that you can get from cases for coins that are earned during the game. These skins are distributed by rarity. Because of the skins you will have the motivation to earn coins and open cases.

Thirdly, there are different types of weapons in Sky battles, but so far they are few. They differ in damage and rate of fire. They are issued randomly at the beginning of each round. All weapons are available initially, but in the future there will be such weapons that can be obtained for tasks or from cases.
